title: The Global North learns coping skills from the Global South
description: As 2025 comes to an end, we look back in search of clarity, a pattern, a sign, a hint of hope for 2026. We’ve all been somewhat thrown off balance, collectively and individually, this year. Yet once again, we’re still standing. Journalism is still alive, and its professionals continue to put their whole selves on...
